titles.title: Legalizing Drug Discounts for Seniors Act of 2020
Legalizing Drug Discounts for Seniors Act of 2020
A bill to amend title XI of the Social Security Act to exclude discounts for covered part D drugs from the anti-kickback prohibition, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

bill.summary:
Legalizing Drug Discounts for Seniors Act of 2020
This bill excludes certain discounts for covered drugs under the Medicare prescription drug benefit from the federal anti-kickback statute.
